We have worked on a few projects together and every time he was on the top of the task! I was surprised how easily he could make extraordinary UI experience from the scratch! Open minded, polite, communicative and always ready to go step ahead to satisfy customerâ€™s needs.

name: Hendri Augustine
testimony: Tsara is what we call a rockstar developer. She's one of the core developer in our previous startup and we wouldn't made it without her. She got the perfect combinations of skill, attitude, and great mindset. will definitely work with her again in the near future!

name: Stephen Bilston
testimony: Tsara did a great job in completing our Ruby project. She communicated with us at every step in the process and delivered quality code. I would definitely hire Tsara again for future Ruby work.
